title: Shovel Knight (Linux) (Latest With 1.2.2 Patch) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here shovel Knight. This is the native version of the game Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed.

Changelog for version 1.2.2:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fix: Mail of Momentum providing an extra jump for Shovel Knight. Consider it a sneak peak at Plague Knight!
